entry.title: In Russia's Biggest Cities, Ukraine War Fades to Background Noise
entry.content: Bars are filled to the brim, film and jazz festivals are sold out and Moscow’s police officers are busier handing out fines for public drinking than putting down dissent.

entry.title: American Father Reunited With Child Lost During Kabul Evacuation
entry.content: The story of 8-year-old James mirrored that of thousands of Afghan families torn apart during the evacuation effort that took place after the Taliban seized power last August.

entry.title: Russian Missiles Kill 18 in Residential Area in Odessa Region, Ukraine Says
entry.content: The overnight attack, the latest in a surge of Russian strikes, occurred hours after the conclusion of a NATO summit where President Biden promised to support Ukraine “for as long as it takes.”
